text: Mississippi Records is a record store and label. It was founded by Eric Isaacson in 2003 in Portland, Oregon. It also houses a café, equipment repair shop, and the Portland Museum of Modern Art. On January 1, 2019, filmmaker Cyrus Moussavi and musician Gordon Ashworth became the new owners with Isaacson working as a label project manager. Mississippi Records relocated to Chicago. In 2019, Mississippi Records went on a national tour. == References == ==External links== * Category:2003 establishments in Oregon Category:American independent record labels Category:Oregon record labels Category:Record labels established in 2003 Category:Music of Chicago Category:Companies based in Chicago
title: Mississippi Records
